title: Valorant Agent Tier List
description: This Valorant Agent Tier List is based on the current meta and includes a brief description of each agent's strengths and weaknesses. The agents are ranked from S Tier (the best) to C Tier (the weakest).
heading: Valorant Agent Tier List
introText: This Valorant Agent Tier List is based on the current meta and includes a brief description of each agent's strengths and weaknesses. The agents are ranked from S Tier (the best) to C Tier (the weakest).

data.itemDescription: Jett is a duelist who is known for her mobility and fragging ability. She has a variety of abilities that allow her to get around the map quickly and take out enemies with ease
Neon is a new agent who has quickly become one of the most popular in the game. She is an initiator who has a lot of crowd control abilities, making her great for disrupting enemy teams
Raze is another duelist who is known for her explosive abilities. She can deal a lot of damage in a short amount of time, making her a force to be reckoned with
KAY/O is an initiator who has a lot of information-gathering abilities. He can also suppress enemies, making him a great choice for disrupting enemy teams
Omen is a controller who has a lot of area denial abilities. He can also teleport around the map, making him a very versatile agent
Sova is an initiator who has a lot of scouting abilities. He can also reveal enemies, making him a great choice for gathering information
Killjoy is a sentinel who has a lot of area denial abilities. She can also set up traps, making her a good choice for defending sites
Phoenix is a duelist who has a lot of self-healing abilities. He can also resurrect himself, making him a very survivable agent
Sage is a sentinel who has a lot of healing and supportive abilities. She is a good choice for teams that need a dedicated healer
Brimstone is a controller who has a lot of area denial abilities. However, his abilities are not as versatile as those of other controllers
Viper is a controller who has a lot of area denial abilities. However, her abilities are very situational and can be difficult to use effectively
Yoru is a duelist who has a lot of trickery abilities. However, his abilities are not as reliable as those of other duelists
